profile:
If you live in Canada, you must be aware of its harsh winter season when the temperature can drop down to more than minus 20 degrees. Almost every building, whether it is residential or commercial, comes with in-house HVAC systems, and we are here to ensure the utmost comfort for the people of GTA.

Chin’s Heating and Cooling has been in the industry since 2009, and it has earned a batch of excellence in the field by delivering highly satisfactory HVAC solutions around all provinces. We always take care of the quality and durability of the products we use in our project. Be furnace, air conditioner, water heater, thermostats or air quality services, and we are here to address all HVAC-related problems.

We have developed domain expertise through our experience and continuous effort to become the industry leader. We wish to give our clients the ultimate comfort with our comprehensive HVAC solutions. As an industry leader, we take care of quality, safety, energy efficiency, repair, maintenance and warranty so that you can get long-lasting heating and cooling solutions within your budget.
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

profile:
Unicair Heating and Air Conditioning Ltd is a fully licensed company with qualified technicians in Residential, Commercial and Industrial heating and air conditioning equipment. We have served Metro Toronto's heating and cooling needs since 1990. With over three decades in the business, we provide installation and service small to large heating and cooling projects from home appliances to rooftop units. We also provide maintenance and service contracts of your heating and cooling system to look after your indoor comfort needs and also to extend the life span of the system. Our reputation is based on providing dependable superior quality products and services to the consumer at competitive prices. We are not cheap, but our services are the best.

Unicair will design and perform all work in a professional manner and will treat your property with the respect it deserves. All our technicians are qualified to handle any HVAC equipment from service to installation.

profile:
Riteflow Heating and Air Solutions has been a consistently-growing business for over 8 years. Operating all over Toronto and York Region, we have created a name for ourselves by providing excellent customer service and demonstrating extensive technical knowledge.

Our technicians are experts in HVAC service, installation, maintenance and 24-hour repair. This was attained through years of classroom and field training (which is on-going).

Our technicians have diplomas through George Brown College in HVAC engineering, both residential and commercial/industrial gas licenses through the Technical Standards and Safety Authority, air conditioning licenses through the Ontario College of Trades, as well as extensive training in electrical and carbon monoxide safety.

Your business is always appreciated, please do not hesitate to contact us for all your HVAC needs!

profile:
In 2005, Lucky Air Climate Control Ltd. began offering commercial and residential HVAC services in the Greater Toronto Area. Based in Scarborough, our owner has a decade of experience providing quality installation and repair services at your offices, homes and condo buildings. We try to provide maximum comfort and energy savings for our customers.

In addition to our commercial and residential HVAC services, we are a trusted resource for gas piping (BBQs, pool heaters, fireplaces, stoves and more). Our owner has more than a decade of experience working on condo buildings, commercial offices and residential property. Trust Lucky Air Climate Control Ltd. to handle all your projects and emergency needs; give us a call to learn more about our service and get a quote today.

Call us today to schedule an appointment.

profile:
At PureFilters our mission is simple: We strive to be the leader in discount furnace filters in Canada.

We want you to buy right from the source instead of having to go through big box retailers. By avoiding having to pay for large retail space, employee salaries and whatever other overhead, we are able to pass major savings onto you and offer furnace filters at a discount price.

We also strive in educating consumers in furnace filters installation and air quality. PureFilters strongly believes in installing furnace filters yourself, instead of paying big bucks for a technician to do it.

Purify Your Air Today!

profile:
Golden Plug Air Conditioning has enjoyed over 35 years in business as one of Toronto’s and the GTA’s leaders in the supply and installation of windows, through-the-wall and split ductless air conditioners. We are able to address your air conditioning needs with a full range of services which include rentals, sales, service and installation.

We are the authorized Friedrich® dealer and service centre in the GTA.

Quality AC Service
Owned and operated by Peter Bird, with his team of installers and technicians, Golden Plug Air Conditioning prides itself in providing courteous, prompt, worry free and professional service to new and valued existing customers. Contact us today for all of your air conditioning needs.

Our valued customers include residential homes, commercial businesses, retirement lodges and long term care facilities as well as daycares, education facilities and the University of Toronto’s downtown campus.

Email us at goldenplugair@rogers.com or give us a call at 416-431-3000 (Toronto area) or 905-727-7577 (Aurora/Newmarket). Our office staff will be glad to assist you.
 
WINDOW AIR CONDITIONERS –RENTAL, SALES AND SERVICE
 
ROOM AIR CONDITIONERS—RENTAL, SALES AND SERVICE
 
WINDOW AIR CONDITIONERS INSTALLATION
 
THROUGH THE WALL AIR CONDITIONERS—RENTAL, SALES AND SERVICE
 
SPLIT DUCTLESS AIR CONDITIONERS—SALES AND SERVICE
 
PORTABLE AIR CONDITIONERS—RESIDENTIAL AND COMMERCIAL
services:
GTA Air Conditioning Service
We offer low cost service for all makes of window and through-the-wall air conditioners, and for your convenience, this includes pickup and delivery service throughout Toronto and surrounding areas. Our experienced service technician will promptly repair your unit at our shop using the manufacturer’s recommended parts.

We also offer a tune-up service which includes a chemical coil cleaning and pressure washing to return the unit to like-new.

Call early to avoid the rush once the air conditioning season arrives.
AC Installation
Our trained, courteous window air conditioner installers will install your air conditioner in almost any situation. Apartment buildings are just one of our specialty areas, and we can install the unit safely, even if you have no balcony.

Whether above a door or where there is a fixed window, these situations pose no problem to our installers. Plexiglas™ and silicone caulking is applied on the inside and outside of the window to ensure an air and water-tight seal.

Storage
We can also provide winter storage for your window air conditioner, however space is limited and is on a first come basis. There is an additional charge for pickup and delivery
Window AC units
Certificate of Professional Installation
Need certification that your window air conditioner is installed professionally and safely for your landlord? We can come to your home or apartment and inspect the installation of your window air conditioner. If the unit is not properly and/or safely installed, we will quote you our price to reinstall the unit and provide you with our certificate stating that the unit has been installed professionally and safely by a reputable, experienced air conditioning company with over 35 years of experience. Call us to schedule an appointment.
specialities:
Helpful Hints
Before purchasing or renting an air conditioning unit, remember these helpful hints:
Measure the space that the AC unit is to fit into (height and width of the clear opening)
Know the approximate square footage of the space you wish to cool L x W = Sq. Ft.
Window units have vents on the sides, and some have top vent which cannot be obstructed
Wall units have no vents on the sides or top and fit into a “sleeve” below the window
Call early to schedule a convenient delivery and installation day and time
Frequently Asked Questions
Why is it important for an air conditioner to dehumidify?
Air conditioners keep you comfortable by removing heat and moisture from the air. To do both effectively, the unit must be properly sized for your space. If the capacity is too low, you may never feel quite cool enough. When the capacity is too high, the unit produces so much cold air so quickly that the room reaches the desired temperature before the unit has adequate run time to dehumidify. The result is a cool but clammy room that can feel just as uncomfortable as one that is not cool enough.

I occasionally see black particles blowing out of my unit. What are these, & do I need to do anything about it?
If your unit is only a couple of years old, then what you are seeing is probably due to a maintenance issue. Air conditioners remove both heat and humidity from a room. That humidity condenses on the air conditioner coils and drains into the base pan where it is used to cool the unit. Occasionally, mold or mildew will take advantage of this high moisture environment. The only way to alleviate this situation is to have the unit professionally cleaned. Contact Golden Plug Air Conditioning to treat this problem.

Why is there water in the base pan of my air conditioner?
Air conditioners remove both heat and humidity from a room. This process produces condensation which runs off into the base pan. This condensation is then used to cool the hot condenser coil which improves the unit’s performance.

Are there air conditioning options for spaces without an exterior wall?
Absolutely! One of the best options is a ductless split system, because the indoor unit can be mounted virtually anywhere. Depending on the system, the indoor and outdoor units can be separated by up to 164 feet with maximum height differences of 98 feet. So even if the rooms that need cooling are located in the building’s interior or on separate floors, there may be a ductless system that will fit the application.

What model or product is best for my situation?
Depending on the type of installation and cooling capacity you need, you may find solutions that you never knew existed. To get a complete understanding of the features and benefits on available products, contact Golden Plug Air Conditioning.

What is the decibel rating of my air conditioner?
There is no industry standard for measuring the sound of room air conditioners or an independent agency to verify the ratings. We follow the guidelines set by AHAM (Association of Home Appliance Manufacturers), but these guidelines do not list decibel ratings for home appliances. Without an accepted industry standard, each manufacturer can “test” for sound ratings using whatever methodology they prefer. And without a common testing method, none of the results provide accurate comparisons. That’s why we do not publish sound ratings.

What causes ice to build up in an air conditioner?
Icing can be caused by a number of factors. Units that have not been cleaned over a long period of time may have coils and fins clogged by dust, dirt or debris. Clogged coils and fins restrict air flow through the unit, which can cause the compressor to work even harder – so hard, that it may reduce the coil temperature below the normal range in an attempt to make up for the lost cooling power from the blocked coils.

Another potential cause is running a unit with a very cold set point (i.e., turning the target temperature down very low) on low fan speed for an extended period of time. This can cause excess condensate to build up on the coils, further lowering the temperature of the coil and leading to icing.

Water is draining into my room from my air conditioner. What do I do?
This problem generally has one of two causes: the unit was not installed properly with the outside lower than the inside to allow for adequate exterior drainage, or there may be a clog in the drain pan where condensate collects during operation.

If you feel that neither of these conditions exists, check for air leaking in from the outside anywhere around the unit. Air leaks will cause condensation to form on the outside of the unit, and this water will drain into your room. If there are any air leaks, resealing them should address the problem.

My unit produces cold air, but it keeps turning off & on every few minutes, & I’m never comfortable. What is happening?
Your unit is probably too large for your room and is “short cycling”. This happens when cold air from an oversized unit bounces off the wall and back towards the unit, creating a room temperature reading that’s cooler than the actual temperature. This false reading causes the compressor to shut off before the room has truly reached your desired set-point. While the compressor is off, the “real” room air enters the intake grille, and the thermostat reads that the room is no longer at the set temperature, so it turns the compressor back on. Your unit cycles off and on approximately every two to three minutes to reach the set-point. While the air coming out of the unit is cold, the compressor does not remain on long enough to cool the entire room.

The only solution is to correctly size the unit’s capacity to the room size and demand. A unit’s capacity is determined by its BTU. Larger rooms need a higher-capacity unit (a greater BTU) to cool correctly. But a unit that is too large for the room will reach its set point too quickly, and the compressor will turn off before the air conditioner has had adequate time to remove humidity from the air.

How do I choose the correct unit capacity/BTU size?
You should consider a number of variables when sizing a unit, such as location, room insulation, how many people will be using the room, size and location of windows, to name a few. Golden Plug Air Conditioning can provide you with professional advice in making this important decision.

It’s cold outside but hot inside, & I need to use my air conditioner. What now?
Your air conditioner is designed to cool in warm weather when the outside temperature is above 60° Fahrenheit and below 115° Fahrenheit, so it won’t cool a room if it’s cool outside. If you want to cool a room in the winter, set your unit to Fan Only mode (if it has one) and set the Fresh Air/Exhaust control to Fresh Air. This will bring in a supply of outside air. You can do this as long as the outside temperature is above freezing.

Can I use a cover over the outside of my air conditioner during the months when it is not in use?
Please do not cover the outside of your air conditioner unless you first remove the unit from the sleeve, clean it and dry the base pan. Air conditioners are designed to hold water in the base pan. If the air conditioner is covered, the water cannot evaporate, and mold and mildew will form. If the air conditioner is installed per the instruction, you should not have problems with air coming in or around the unit. Everything in the rear of the air conditioner is sealed, so snow and rain cannot harm the air conditioner.

profile:
Keeping your home warm in the winter is challenging enough. Now that summer is here, you want your home to be cool and comfortable in the hot weather. The experts at Heating Ontario are qualified air conditioning contractors; they'll help keep you cool in the summer, just like they help keep you warm during the winter.

Heating Ontario air conditioning contractors specialize in finding the right system for your home. No matter what size your home is, you can be sure our expert technicians will devise a plan to keep your home cool without breaking the bank. They'll make sure your indoor environment is healthy and comfortable, giving you options for choosing the air conditioning system that is right for your home and your family.

Whether you need a brand new air conditioning unit or an assessment of your current system, Heating Ontario's air conditioning contractors are standing by to help you decide which options are best for you. We repair and install cooling systems from the same quality brands as our furnaces, so when you need a new unit, you know you are getting the best. Our affordable installation and service prices make it easy to upgrade or maintain the system you have. We service and install the most energy-efficient cooling systems, so you can chill out without worrying about running up a big hydro bill.

Now is the time to make sure your cooling system is in top shape for summer. Our air conditioning contractors service all of Toronto and the GTA. Fill out the form below to inquire about a consultation. Our experts are standing by waiting to hear from you.

We provide both homeowners and businesses with repairs and installations.
If you take a look at our testimonials, you'll find that our customers say we are on time, on budget, and go the extra mile. We take the time to listen to you and plan out the most cost-effective, energy-efficient, and environmentally-friendly system that will fit your needs. We work on all major brands. At the end of the job, we clean up your home or business like we'd never been there. We also make sure that you know how to use your system and help you with the paperwork for rebates or tax credits.

Right now, if you install new energy-efficient heating and air conditioning equipment, the Federal Government will give you up to $500 in tax credits. This can significantly cut you income tax bill this year as well as save on your energy bills and reduce your carbon footprint for years to come. If you give me a call at one of the phone numbers below, I'll go over this with you.

Also, for your convenience, we work until 6 p.m. weekdays and until 1 p.m. on Saturdays.

I will be happy to answer any questions and provide you with the information that you need, whether it's regarding a air conditioning repair or installation. Please give me a call at 416.573.7212 if you would like a more comfortable home or business while saving on energy and money.

profile: City Gas Company Limited is a family owned and operated Heating and Cooling Contractor that has been servicing the GTA since 1982. We pride ourselves on honest staff, quality workmanship and products, at competative pricing. We stand behind all our work and you see that in the warranties we offer our customers. Give us a call and see why over 35, 000 people in the GTA continue to use our services!

profile:
AZ Comfort Air is a Mississauga residential and commercial heating & cooling service company.
With 35 years of combined experience in the HVAC industry, our extremely knowledgeable staff can install, service, and maintain your home gas furnace, air conditioner or water heater as well as we service commercial air system backed with a premium five-year parts and labor warranty that is almost exclusive to AZ Comfort Air. Our history stands behind us.

We service and maintain all other major name heating and cooling systems to satisfy the needs of our Mississauga home owners. We work with both residential and commercial HVAC systems. We can service any brand name, guaranteed. Call us for a FREE estimate for a new gas furnace or air conditioner installation.

When required, subcontract work to a licensed professional for Refrigeration.

RESIDENTIAL HEATING AND AIR CONDITIONING SERVICING THE GTA

profile:
Comfort Air Mechanical Services has been providing installation and maintenance to HVAC equipment for over 25 years of service experience. At Comfort Air Mechanical Services we want you to be COMFORTABLE all at an affordable price!

Free Estimates Available
We install, service, and provide maintenance on all makes and models. If you are interested in having a unit installed in your home, please leave us a request message. We'll set up a convenient date for your home inspection and let you know exactly what you need. Thanks!

Call NOW and take advantage of these offers!
-  10% off your first service INCLUDING labor and parts!
-  FREE digital thermostat with every furnace installation!
-  0% interest on replacement furnaces and A/C,s  with 6 equal payments  upon approved credit!
-  FREE 10 YEAR parts & labor on all Furnace and A/C packages (conditions may apply)
-  Rebates up to $250 available on many units…call us for details!

(Certain conditions apply to all offers…call for details)

Our team specializes in the installation and service of all types of heating, ventilation, air conditioning and hot water systems. We take pride in our company by providing you with complete satisfaction.

We offer our customers trustworthy installation, maintenance, tune ups and inspection services to all makes and models of HVAC equipment that will insure your equipment runs reliably and efficiently.

This will help save money with your utility costs. Ask us today about our Annual Protection Plan Package! Our service technicians will maintain your system year-round to ensure it turns out properly and efficiently.

profile:
The Canadian climate certainly isn’t kind to your HVAC system. During the harsh winter months, frigid temperatures ensure your furnace or boiler is operating at its maximum limits to keep you warm. When summer comes around, the heat has you blasting cool air consistently throughout your home. All of that takes its toll, and eventually, you could be left with an HVAC system that fails at an inopportune time. Ensure that doesn’t happen by giving Precision HVAC Mechanics Inc a call today!

Whether you’re looking to install a new air conditioner or repair an older furnace, we’re equipped to provide HVAC services in Brampton. Bought a new air conditioner after your old one gave out? Let us take the installation off your hands! Are you left shivering in your home due to your boiler malfunctioning? Handling the problem yourself may only make matters worse. Licensed and insured, we’re able to safely and efficiently solve your heating crisis.

Commercial HVAC Service
Looking to add a new rooftop unit to your business? Need a heating or cooling unit for your construction site? We offer commercial HVAC services, too! Keep your clients comfortable in your building with a regularly-maintained HVAC system. We’re also able to provide an energy assessment for your business, giving you an expert recommendation to help you save on your next energy bill.

Don’t wait until your HVAC system fails. We’re open 7 days a week, so give us a call today to let us keep your system running smoothly!

services:
AIR-CONDITIONING INSTALLATION AND REPAIR
Hiring an air conditioner installation service is important if you want to have the air conditioning unit properly added to your home and have it functioning for years to come. While there is plenty of information available on the internet that might allow for you to embark on a do-it-yourself project you will want a qualified professional to do the job so you don't encounter any issues later on. The process of installing an air conditioner onto your HVAC system is a very labor intensive and involved process that requires someone who has experience in the field.
Installation of an air conditioning unit requires a lot of different tasks to be completed. Electrical work is involved as well as plumbing work. Neither of these are easy to do unless you know what you are doing and if you slip up with either during installation it can cost you a lot of money to fix. You are installing something onto your HVAC system and you don't want to cause damage to your furnace as well. When dealing with the moisture that needs to be properly removed from the air conditioning unit you will want to ensure that moisture goes where it needs to instead of damaging your home or the air conditioning unit.

HEATING SYSTEM INSTALLATION AND REPAIR
Hiring a professional plumber for installing or replacing a furnace is recommended rather than DIY. This is because there are many things that can be overlooked by the typical lay person. A trained specialist knows exactly what to look for and how to spot potential problems before they arise. Professionals have been through the proper training and installed numerous furnaces on a daily basis.The experience alone is worth the money spent to hire a well trained professional. Someone who installs furnaces on a regular basis is familiar with a variety of different brands of furnaces and has had experience installing each unique brand. By installing or replacing the furnace yourself, you could damage part of the unit and it usually isn't covered by a warranty. With a specialist installing the furnace, should anything damage the unit, the warranty is still effective.

profile:
CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to serve your HVAC needs quickly, efficiently and professionally with 24/7 emergency service at an affordable rate to keep you calm and comfortable at anytime.  

Specializing in service, installation, maintenance and repairs on all related HVACR equipment whether it's your system that's unfortunately malfunctioned, a newer more sophisticated energy efficient system needing upgrading or general tune ups & preventative maintenance on your existing system, CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to satisfy your needs with peace of mind being priority. 

Service all makes and models of HVACR equipment in Residential, Commercial & Industrial sectors of the industry on:
-----------------------------------
- Furnace
- Air Conditioning 
- Water Heaters
- Unit Heaters 
- Heat Pumps
- Radiant Tube Heaters
- Ductless Splits 
- Ductwork 
- Boilers
- Humidification
- Gas Piping 
- Ventilation
- Commercial Rooftops
- Reach In Coolers 
-----------------------------------

profile:
Nationwide Home Comfort specializes in quality residential HVAC services throughout Ontario. We are one of the fastest growing Home Services providers that pride ourselves in giving our customers the best possible service and top-notch products. Our installation and service teams are among the most knowledgeable in the industry, and undergo strict training and development.

Why Choose Nationwide?

Quality On Time Service
We guarantee same day service or installation on all of our products, being focused on our service commitment is a standard at Nationwide Home Comfort. We have a large network of certified technicians on call, at all times. 
 
Seamless Installation, Top Notch Products
Nationwide Home Comfort installs only the best, most advanced HVAC and Water Treatment products Installed by our certified technicians. Making your home more comfortable.

More than your basic customer service 
From our call centre agents to our service technicians, we're committed to providing the best advice to ensure your home comfort.

Thorough Energy Assessments
At Nationwide Home Comfort we provide each customer with a thorough energy assessment walking you through exactly what you can expect to save, rebates you will receive, and all of the benefits of upgrading.
 
100% Coverage Guaranteed 
Our large network of certified technicians are on call 24 hours per day to provide you with worry-free coverage for the lifetime of any Rent-to-Own equipment. Guaranteed.

profile:
Our mechanical experts are dedicated to completing your project (large or small) with quality results, on time, and within your budget. We are a family owned and operated business servicing the GTA, with extensive experience and knowledge in forced air heating and cooling, hot water heating, ductless heating and cooling, and gas fireplace installs

If you are looking to simply upgrade your heating and cooling or renovate your entire mechanical system, Brandelle Mechanical can help you. We team up with architects and engineers to get full mechanical permits and architectural drawings to get the job done right, to code, on time, and within your budget.

With our team of technicians we offer forced air heating and cooling, ductless heating and cooling, hot water heating, and radiant in-floor heating. We also offer tankless water heaters, conventional hot water tanks, gas-piping, humidifiers, air purification, and top quality fireplaces to improve the aesthetic of any room or home.

As Tempstar, Keeprite, Goodman, Napoleon, and Olsen dealers we offer our customers the finest products at competitive pricing.

To make our products affordable on any budget we also offer rental programs on tankless water heaters, hot water tanks, furnaces, boilers, and air conditioners.

Additionally we offer 24/7 service on all mechanical appliances!
service_area: Toronto, Etobicoke, Vaughan, Brampton, Mississauga, Richmond Hill, Scarborough and Cottage Country.
products:
LICENSED DEALERS of Keeprite, Goodman, Tempstar Furnaces, Air conditioners, Mini Splits, Air handlers and exhaust equipment.
LICENSED DEALERS of Mitsubishi Electric Heating and Cooling products, Mini Split AC, Heat pumps and accessories. 
LICENSED DEALER Generac generators and power systems  
LICENSED Olsen Dealer of Hot Water Heating equipment, Boilers, expansion tanks and circulation pumps.
Stellrad radiator dealer 
John Wood Hot water Tanks 
Tankless water heaters from Navien, Norritz, Takagi as well as wall hung Boilers
LICENSED Napoleon fire place dealer
LICENSED Valor fire place dealer
services:
Our team of service technicians as well as mechanical designer can take a project from design to completion. 
We offer Re&Re installs of furnace, AC, mini split ac systems, boilers, hot water tanks, tankless water heaters, rad replacement, Generac generators, fireplaces, humidifiers, thermostats, as well as gas piping.
Full mechanical design, permitting, install and inspection for new or custom home construction. 
Code violation, TSSA violation and Red Tag repair.
Annual maintenance of ALL heating and cooling products as well service contracts.

profile: Air Solar System is founded by some of the best and brightest talents in HVAC Industry. We accumulated over 18 years of experience inside and outside of Canada with the state of the art engineering.Since our establishment in Canada, Air Solar  has continued to follow our basic philosophy of helping customers through better understanding of customer needs.Heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) is the technology of indoor and vehicular environmental comfort. Its goal is to provide thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality. HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the principles of thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer. Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field's abbreviation as HVAC&R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR

profile:
“THE INDOOR CLIMATE SPECIALISTS”

As a family-owned business for over 45 years in the Greater Toronto Area, World of Comfort has been taking care of the air you breathe.  From furnaces and air conditioners to boilers and radiant floors to service and seasonal maintenance, we’ve been looking after your indoor comfort needs.  We are the “Indoor Climate Specialists”.  Making the air you breathe…fresh, clean and comfortable.  And we are a York Certified Comfort Expert!

We custom design and build our cooling and heating systems just right for your home or business and we guarantee our service. 

Our HIGH EFFICIENCY PRODUCTS include:

• GAS FURNACES
• HEATING BOILERS
• TANKLESS WATER HEATERS

profile:
Cavalry Mechanical is a full-service company specializing in all aspects of plumbing for commercial, residential and multi-family housing.  We ensure that each job, no matter the size, is given the time and attention it deserves.  We offer free quotes for your project and can offer new, innovative ideas.  We try to think outside of the box to ensure you have a multiute of choices for your project.

We are a locally- owned and operated company with over 30 years of experience in the Plumbing industry. Over the years we have progressed in our success with professionalism, integrity, honesty and our dedication to taking pride in our workmanship. With dedication and confidence, we guarantee our workmanship and materials.  We have a close working relationship with our suppliers which ensures that we are up to date on the latest products and technology in the industry.  We are aware of the needs an requirements for any job or project that you may be looking to undertake.

At Cavalry Mechanical Ltd. we are a full service contractor. Providing you with all your residential & commercial needs. Everything from small plumbing repairs to a complete installation. Being full service, this includes all HVAC and electrical repairs or new projects. Before any work is performed we give you a quote so you know what your getting for the price that works for you. All work is included with a one year warranty on parts and labor. So call in the Cavalry to get the job done right the first time!

profile: For the most dependable and affordable home comfort in Toronto, call Rinia Group Mechanical. Our certified team of HVAC technicians services, installs and repairs all makes and models of furnaces, heating systems and air conditioners, including ductless air conditioning and heat pumps. We offer emergency repair service, preventative maintenance plans, and have the experience and expertise to tailor indoor comfort solutions to fit your specific needs. -We're a family-owned business - owned and operated since 1982.
